name: give-me-a-gradient
description: Gives you a gradient based on the colors of an image.

scripts.build: parcel build --no-content-hash --global renderGradient --no-source-maps ./dev/public/scripts/renderGradient.js -d ./dist/ && parcel build --no-content-hash --no-source-maps ./dev/public/scripts/renderGradient.js -d ./dist/ --out-file renderGradient.common.js
scripts.test: parcel build --no-content-hash --no-minify --global generatePaletteFromImage ./dev/public/scripts/generatePaletteFromImage.js -d ./temp && parcel build --no-content-hash --no-minify --global renderGradient ./dev/public/scripts/renderGradient.js -d ./temp && parcel build --no-content-hash --no-minify --global loadImage ./dev/public/scripts/loadImage.js -d ./temp && mocha dev/tests/

author: Inclushe
